snippet: In a memoir, “Total Recall,” Arnold Schwarzenegger describes his youth, his bodybuilding career, his term as California’s governor, his marital infidelity and his philosophy, among other things.
abstract: Janet Maslin reviews memoir Total Recall: My Unbelievably True Life Story, written by Arnold Schwarzenegger with Peter Petre.
lead_paragraph: In a memoir, “Total Recall,” Arnold Schwarzenegger describes his youth, his bodybuilding career, his term as California’s governor, his marital infidelity and his philosophy, among other things.

headline.seo: ‘Total Recall,’ by Arnold Schwarzenegger With Peter Petre
headline.main: He’s Back All Right, Now With a Memoir
headline.print_headline: He’s Back All Right, Now With a Memoir
